name: Driftcloud Wave
description:
When you switch to the character to which this is attached: Deal 1 Anemo DMG.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> Deal 1 $[K105].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
